name: KungFu Shadow Street
description:
KungFu Shadow Street has brought a revolution to the classic street fighting games with its most furious fighting technique of the modern super fighter heros. The street fighting games are as old as the mankind history yet this super hero fight game will take you to the new world of street fighting games, where you can get the experience of ultimate kung Fu fight between the super heros.

Features:
- High-quality 3D graphics and attack effects
- Cool and easy control special moves
- Does not require networking, offline mode can play
- Each fighter has its own unique special moves
- Eazy and sensible control
- Gorgeous action design
